1.title: Lucky

episode of.title: Jean Claude Van Damme: Behind Closed Doors (TV Series 2011– )

1.plot: In this first episode, Jean Claude breaks down in tears as he revisits the church where he had an epiphany as child - an event that changed his life forever. He travels thousands of miles to play Napoleon in a Russian film, only to discover he's actually playing himself and has to be beaten up a transvestite who forces him to swap clothes.

2.title: Birthday

episode of.title: Jean Claude Van Damme: Behind Closed Doors (TV Series 2011– )

2.plot: In this episode, it's the week of Jean Claude's 50th birthday and time for poignant reflection on a roller-coaster life. Wife Gladys also takes a trip down memory lane in LA. She revisits the home they lived in when Jean Claude first hit the big time and returns to the cafe where they had their first date. It's an emotional journey for Gladys - she remembers the good times, but is also reminded of the hard times, when Jean Claude fell victim to drugs.

3.title: Dubai

episode of.title: Jean Claude Van Damme: Behind Closed Doors (TV Series 2011– )

3.plot: In this episode, Jean Claude decides to attempt a Rocky Balboa style comeback in the kickboxing ring against a brutal Olympic champion. At the age of 50, he wants to prove he's still got what it takes to recapture some of his past glory.

4.title: Attila

episode of.title: Jean Claude Van Damme: Behind Closed Doors (TV Series 2011– )

4.plot: In this episode, Jean Claude's back in the middle of the action on the set of action movie "Weapon," but rehearsals for his latest fight scene go badly wrong, when some over-enthusiastic punches leave his co-star in trouble

5.title: Episode #1.5

episode of.title: Jean Claude Van Damme: Behind Closed Doors (TV Series 2011– )

5.plot: Jean Claude finishes shooting Dragon Eyes, but a stunt goes wrong. Bianca brings her new boyfriend home for Christmas to meet the family. Will he survive?

6.title: Episode #1.6

episode of.title: Jean Claude Van Damme: Behind Closed Doors (TV Series 2011– )

6.plot: JCVD is trying to fix the date of his match against Somrak. Then he hears bad news about the new Bloodsport movie. Frustrated, he suddenly reveals his innermost thoughts to the camera.

7.title: Episode #1.7

episode of.title: Jean Claude Van Damme: Behind Closed Doors (TV Series 2011– )

7.plot: While Kris and Bianca finish shooting Weapon in Romania, JCVD cameos in a comedy shooting in Paris, records his dialogue in Kung Fu Panda 2, shoots a commercial for Gillette and finds time for his fans. Tired, he returns to his hometown.

8.title: Episode #1.8

episode of.title: Jean Claude Van Damme: Behind Closed Doors (TV Series 2011– )

8.plot: Jean Claude presents an award at a gala. He goes apartment-hunting for Kris and Ilara. Bianca trains and auditions for the new Mortal Kombat. The family goes out for a dinner - with a surprise guest. But has movie-making weakened his hearing?

imdb.plot outline: Jean-Claude Van Damme aka 'The Muscles from Brussels' is a massive box office star with roles in movies including Bloodsport, Universal Soldier and The Expendables 2. In Jean-Claude Van Damme: Behind Closed Doors his private life is exposed for the first time as he allows cameras access behind the scenes at his home and when he's at work on set. Van Damme and his family reveal the man behind the movie legend who works and parties hard. We discover a sensitive but complex character who is strong enough to take on the world, but who also regrets his rock 'n' roll lifestyle and desperately misses his family when he is away filming. This is an intimate portrait of an international movie star as you've never seen him before.
